<div id="cmsms_heading_6400e3e42e4815_57032683" class="cmsms_heading_wrap cmsms_heading_align_center">
	<h1 class="cmsms_heading">When to bring your child to the dentist?</h1>
</div>
<div id="cmsms_heading_6400e3e42e4b30_83913213" class="cmsms_heading_wrap cmsms_heading_align_left">
	<h3 class="cmsms_heading">We encourage you to keep good oral health a priority in your child’s life. A child’s first tooth emerges at around six month’s old and over the next 12-13 years, these baby teeth will fall out and be replaced by the permanent set of teeth. Your child’s first dental visit is recommended by 12 months of age or within 6 months of the first tooth erupting. The visit includes a full exam of the teeth, jaws, bite and gums. It is your responsibility as a parent to provide your child with proper dental care so that your child’s smile is attractive and their teeth and gums are healthy.</h3>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_column one_half">

<div id="cmsms_divider_6400e3e42e55e6_79902880" class="cl"></div>

<ul id="cmsms_icon_list_items_6400e3e42ec521_55062426" class="cmsms_icon_list_items cmsms_icon_list_type_list cmsms_icon_list_pos_left cmsms_color_type_border llm_wd_list_text"><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e3e42ecd40_59279810" class="cmsms_icon_list_item cmsms-icon-star-3">Any problems are caught on early and be addressed accordingly. </li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e3e42ecf10_64730280" class="cmsms_icon_list_item cmsms-icon-star-3">Regular check-ups make certain that any cavities are filled and oral hygiene is being up kept</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e3e42ed062_95786339" class="cmsms_icon_list_item cmsms-icon-star-3">Can also help in identifying any future problems before the permanent set of teeth pushes its way in that they are aligned correctly and your child will not face any serious problems in the future.</li></ul>
</div>
</div>

<div id="cmsms_heading_6400e3e42f5c21_09961270" class="cmsms_heading_wrap cmsms_heading_align_center">
	<h1 class="cmsms_heading">YOUR CHILD’S APPOINTMENT INCLUDES:</h1>
</div> 
<ul id="cmsms_icon_list_items_6400e3e42f5e95_87664408" class="cmsms_icon_list_items cmsms_icon_list_type_block cmsms_icon_list_pos_left cmsms_color_type_border llm_wd_list_text"><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e3e42f62e8_48193995" class="cmsms_icon_list_item llm_wd_list_text">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-edit-2"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Complete Check-up</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>Our dentists will carry out a complete check-up including assessing their overall health and oral health. X-rays may also be taken to detect any future problems.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e3e42f6662_05613096" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-edit-2"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Cleaning and Scaling</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>Cleaning and scaling may be done and a fluoride treatment may also be carried out as required.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e3e42f69b2_83423144" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-edit-2"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Advise on oral health</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>Your child will also be advised on the importance of keeping good oral health by avoiding sugary drinks and food, brushing their teeth and flossing twice a day</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li></ul>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_column one_half llm_wd_right_b_box">

<div id="cmsms_heading_6400e3e42f74e2_90650968" class="cmsms_heading_wrap cmsms_heading_align_center">
	<h1 class="cmsms_heading llm_wd_list_text">TIPS FOR BRUSHING YOUR CHILD’S TEETH</h1>
</div> 
<ul id="cmsms_icon_list_items_6400e3e42f7719_36805300" class="cmsms_icon_list_items cmsms_icon_list_type_block cmsms_icon_list_pos_left cmsms_color_type_border llm_wd_list_text"><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e3e42f7ad2_48572345" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-check-3"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Brushing with Fun</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>Try to make brushing fun for your child and attach it to an activity like playing a song while brushing on their devices so that they slowly brush their teeth well for the prescribed 2 minutes.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e3e42f7df0_77428160" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-check-3"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">″Pea-Sized″ Amount of Toothpaste</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>Kids under the age of 7 years are advised to use a ‘pea-sized’ amount of toothpaste to brush their teeth.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e3e42f8099_25428908" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-check-3"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Brushing the Teeth Gently </h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>Do not scrub the gums with brush and don’t put force while moving the brush from left to right or vice versa.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li></ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
